snippet.title: Dread X Collection Trailer
snippet.description:
The Dread X Collection pays tribute to the concept of a "Playable Trailer" pioneered by the canceled Kojima project PT by collecting samplings of 10 dream horror projects from aspiring independent developers in one package. Rather than repeating the PT formula with "spooky hallway" clones, these unique projects explore the boundaries of horror and insanity in a variety of new ways. Some may become full-fledged games one day, others may follow PT and Silent Hills into the netherworld, but playing all 10 Dread X Collection games will give you a glimpse into the bewildering beyond of horror gaming.

Terrify yourself ten ways with the Dread X Collection, an anthology of ten playable "Playable Teasers" for horror game projects from 10 incredibly passionate solo developers. Included in Dread X Collection are games by Airdorf, Lovely Hellplace, Mahelyk (Kyle Frost), Oddbreeze, Scythe Dev Team, SecretCowLevel, Snowrunner Games, Strange Scaffold, David Szymanski, and Torple Dook.
